headline: These Stocks Moved the Most Today: Apple, Tesla, GM, Nvidia, Super Micro, MicroStrategy, U.S. Steel, Alibaba, and More
summary: Shares of Apple and Tesla tumble as both get their price targets cut by a longtime Wall Street bull, General Motors is downgraded, and MicroStrategy follows Bitcoin lower.

headline: Eli Lilly Stock Is Falling. It Isn’t Just About Tariffs.
summary: The Trump administration did away with a Biden-era proposal to allow Medicare to start paying for weight loss drugs such as Eli Lilly’s Zepbound.

headline: Novo preparing for early launch of weight-loss drug Wegovy in India
summary: Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk is looking at an early launch of its blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy in India to better compete with rival Eli Lilly in the populous nation, two sources familiar with the plans told Reuters.  Novo, which had earlier planned for a 2026 launch of the drug, is now looking to begin selling Wegovy in India "this year, probably in the next few months," sources told Reuters on condition of anonymity as they were not authorized to talk to the media.

raw.headline: Novo preparing for early launch of weight-loss drug Wegovy in India
raw.summary: Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk is looking at an early launch of its blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy in India to better compete with rival Eli Lilly in the populous nation, two sources familiar with the plans told Reuters.  Novo, which had earlier planned for a 2026 launch of the drug, is now looking to begin selling Wegovy in India "this year, probably in the next few months," sources told Reuters on condition of anonymity as they were not authorized to talk to the media.

headline: NVO & LLY Shares Down on Exclusion of Obesity Drugs From Medicare
summary: CMS keeps out LLY and NVO's obesity drugs from Medicare coverage. Medicare, at present, does not cover obesity drugs if they are solely prescribed for weight loss.

raw.headline: NVO & LLY Shares Down on Exclusion of Obesity Drugs From Medicare

headline: Big Pharma Stocks Dive Amid Trade War Jitters & Inflation Woes

headline: Trump rejects Biden administration plan to let Medicare cover obesity drugs
summary: The decision is a setback for GLP-1 drugmakers, though it's not entirely surprising given the Trump administration’s focus on curbing government spending.
